data.text: Esiae nye nyagblɔɖi si Mawu ɖe fia Nyagblɔɖila Nahum, Elkositɔ, le ŋutega me tso nu si ava dzɔ ɖe Ninive dzi la ŋu, eye wòŋlɔe ɖe agbalẽ sia me.
Yehowa nye Mawu ʋãŋu kple hlɔ̃biala.
Ame ka ate ŋu anɔ te ɖe eƒe dziku nu?
Yehowa nyo, elabena enye sitsoƒe le xaxa me!
Nugbe ɖe sia ɖe si woɖo ɖe Yehowa ŋu la,
O Ninive, mewòe ame si ɖo nugbe ɖe Yehowa ŋu,
Azɔ la, maŋe kɔkuti le wò kɔ,
Yehowa de se tso wò Ninive ŋuti be:
Kpɔ ɖa, dɔlawo tso towo dzi gbɔna
